message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1400000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand you're aiming for a lower price, but $1200000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1300000, but that's my final offer. If we can't agree, I'll have to explore other options.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $1300000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1200000, but I'm not willing to go any higher. Can you consider that?
